name: NSPopoverDelegate
desc: A set of optional methods that a popover delegate can implement to provide additional or custom functionality.

items.name: func detachableWindow(for: NSPopover) -> NSWindow?
items.desc: Detaches the popover creating a window containing the content.

items.name: func popoverShouldClose(NSPopover) -> Bool
items.desc: Allows a delegate to override a close request.

items.name: func popoverWillShow(Notification)
items.desc: Invoked when the popover will show.

items.name: func popoverDidShow(Notification)
items.desc: Invoked when the popover has been shown.

items.name: func popoverWillClose(Notification)
items.desc: Invoked when the popover is about to close.

items.name: func popoverDidClose(Notification)
items.desc: Invoked when the popover did close.

items.name: func popoverDidDetach(NSPopover)
items.desc: Indicates that a popover has been released while it's in an implicitly detached state.

items.name: func popoverShouldDetach(NSPopover) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a popover should detach from its positioning view and become a separate window.
